snippet: Bogotá, the Colombian capital, relies on recent architectural innovations in libraries and schools as oases of civility and pride.
abstract: Colombian capital of Bogota holds on to recent architectural innovations in libraries and schools as oases of civility and pride, but stalled projects and lack of commitment to long-term plans continues to threaten the progress, a long-time problem for the city.
lead_paragraph: Bogotá, the Colombian capital, relies on recent architectural innovations in libraries and schools as oases of civility and pride.

headline.seo: Bogotá, With Pockets of Hope in Recent Architecture
headline.main: Past Its Golden Moment, Bogotá Clings to Hope
headline.print_headline: Past Its Golden Moment, Bogotá Clings to Hope
